snippet: Third-seeded Danka Kovinic of Montenegro and No. 5 Polona Hercog of Slovenia each advanced to the second round with wins over Americans at the Rio Open clay-court tournament on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Danka Kovinic of Montenegro and No. 5 Polona Hercog of Slovenia each advanced to the second round with wins over Americans at the Rio Open clay-court tournament on Monday.

headline.print_headline: No. 3 Danka Kovinic and No. 5 Polona Hercog Advance in Rio
headline.main: No. 3 Danka Kovinic and No. 5 Polona Hercog Advance in Rio
